body: What is the desirable specification you think? Please show us as-is and to-be.

I've uploaded a demo here. This is made on the master branch, i just cloned and ran it. There are multiple components which are calling getDocumentList and the bug occurs when hitting refresh on the (11th or greater document) - it will bring you the corresponding document from 1 to 10 (if u hit refresh on the 11th it will bring you the first document, 12th - second document etc). You can reproduce the issue with any document sample greater than the pagination size (10).
I haven't been able to fix it so far so i can't provide a to-be specification and i've also modified alot on my fork so it might not be that relevant. 
I'll come back with a solution if or when i find one.

Thanks for the good job!
https://imgur.com/a/H7qjw3t

Thank you for providing the detail behavior. I understand this phenomenon as the following.

As-is

* When you execute refresh above the pagination-boundary example (11th or greater document), then the first example appears in front of the page. 

To-Be

* The example showed before the refresh and order of examples should be kept.

Or

* When executing refresh, back to top (1st) example.

rename.to: Execute refresh above the pagination-boundary example causes miss ordering

issue.title: Known issue about Annotation UI

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
**Please read this issue when you faced the problem of annotation user interface.**  
**If you faced the following issue, please upvote üëç related issue that let us judge priority.**

* Display
  * [x] Nonworking delete button is shown for labels of other users #866
  * [x] Feature Request: Keep and Display the new line in the Text Classification Task #879
  * [x] RTL language Support #769
  * [x] Can't change from "Checked" to "Not Checked"? #481
* Filter
  * [x] Done / Undone filter does not work correctly #808
  * [x] After filtering the dataset when clicking the annotation it is not shown the proper data (from the filter) #765
  * [x] Choosing filter twice results in 404 error #754
  * [x] The display of the document index does not change after filtering #594
* Pagination
  - [x] Pagination unresponsive for large documents #873 
  - [x] Execute refresh above the pagination-boundary example causes miss ordering #804 
* File upload
  - [x] Make upload file constraints more clearly #521
  - [x] [Enhancement request] Allow to import unlabeled datasets #658
  - [x]  Unable to import CoNLL files #1046

body: @MikeVlad6 Could you please confirm the behavior of the latest doccano? This bug will be fixed.

issue.title: Fix wrong document list in text classification, closes #887

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
Refers to #887 
Also helps #804 (refresh annotation page become more stable)

It seems that removing getDocumentList() from Paginator and BottomNavigator released this bug. 
So I decided to insert a getDocumentList() in TextClassification.vue but also defined **the offset**.

issue.title: Fix pagination and transition issues

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
closes #890 
- Now that doccano can keep the state of all the projects.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6737785/87644993-d669ed00-c787-11ea-8924-3e407bb90313.png)

closes #850 
![](https://gyazo.com/dbb79ed643c94f85de0017759ad01e91/raw)

closes #804 
![](https://gyazo.com/0400becea09beee98ca5491a1826fbac/raw)

closes #765 
![](https://gyazo.com/5ba7091481adaeec7bde7404cb49b798/raw)

closes #595 
- In dataset page, the URL is changed to `/projects/1/dataset?limit=10&offset=0&q=`.
- In annotation page, the URL is changed to `/projects/1/text-classification?isChecked=false&page=1&q=`.

closes #594 
- Now, the index is shown correctly excluding the case when documents are empty after filtering. In the case, `1/0` is shown.

closes #540 
- Now that we can specify page by id.
